title: FS: T206 Walter Johnson (Portrait) PSA 3 SOLD
author: robw1959

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Walter Johnson (Portrait) PSA 3 SOLD
posts.post_content: Strong PSA 3 with no creases, just normal corner wear - exceptionally sharp for the grade - would not look out of place in a 4 holder. $700 firm - PayPal gift preferred to me at [url]rjweekes@yahoo.com[/url].
